---
title: "{{ product.meta_title }}"
subtitle: "{{ product.meta_description }}"
categories: "{{ product.product_type }}"
image: "{{ product.main_image }}"
page-layout: full
format:
  html:
    css: ../../../assets/css/product.css
    js: ../../../assets/scripts/js/product.js
---

```{=html}
<div class="product-page">

  <section class="product-top">

    <!-- Product Gallery -->
    <div class="product-gallery" aria-label="Product image gallery">
      <img
        id="mainImage"
        src="{{ product.main_image }}"
        alt="{{ product.image_alt_text }}"
        class="main-image"
        loading="eager"
      />

      <div class="carousel" id="thumbnailCarousel">
        {{ product.gallery_thumbnails }}
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Product Info -->
    <div class="product-info">
      <h1>{{ product.meta_title }}</h1>
      <p class="category">{{ product.product_type }}</p>

      <div class="rating">
        ‚≠ê {{ product.product_rating }} ({{ product.review_count }} reviews)
      </div>

      <div class="price-block" id="priceBlock">
        {{ product.price_html }}
      </div>

      <p class="availability">
        {{ product.availability }}
      </p>

      <p class="sku" id="productSKU">
        SKU: {{ product.sku }}
      </p>

      <p class="short-description">
        {{ product.product_short_description }}
      </p>

      <p class="additional_details">
        {{ product.additional_details }}
      </p>

      <!-- Variant Dropdown -->
      {{ product.variants_html }}

      <button
        class="add-to-cart"
        id="addToCartBtn"
        data-sku="{{ product.sku }}"
        data-price="{{ product.price_html }}"
      >
        Add to Cart
      </button>
    </div>

  </section>
</div>
```
<!-- Tabbed Content -->
::: {.tabset}
## Description
{{ product.product_description }}

  <li><strong>Dimensions:</strong> {{ product.product_dimensions }}</li>
  <li><strong>Weight:</strong> {{ product.product_weight }}</li>
  <li><strong>Supplier:</strong> {{ product.supplier_name }}</li>
  <li><strong>Stock Location:</strong> {{ product.stock_location }}</li>
</ul>

## Shipping & Returns
<ul>
  <li><strong>Shipping Cost:</strong> {{ product.shipping_cost }}</li>
  <li><strong>Delivery Time:</strong> {{ product.shipping_time_eta }}</li>
  <li><strong>Regions:</strong> {{ product.shipping_regions }}</li>
  <li><strong>Return Policy:</strong> {{ product.return_policy }}</li>
</ul>
:::
